kpi.name: msc_564b

kpi_info.title: Calls using UPD that have reached the conversation state
kpi_info.use: The number of calls (0...999999) that have reached the conversation state.
kpi_info.use_experience:
The field is updated at the same time as the CALLS counter and the RANAP CONNECT message is received from the RNC or BICC ANM/CON / SIP 200ok(invite) message is received from the exchange
PUBLISHED: M14.4
LAST UPDATE: 30-10-2009
THEORETICAL SUMMARY LEVELS: MSC; MGWMNAME; UPD

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: UPD

KPI CLASS: Traffic
MEASUREMENT(S): UPD measurement M384

kpi.kpi_alias: Calls using UPD that have reached the conversation state
